title: Extra Vitality
data:
{| cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" border="1"
|- style="font-style:italic;" 
|Rank||Effect||Flavor
|-
|1||Adds +4 to your maximum HP. ||You have superior vitality.
|-
|2||Adds +8 to your maximum HP.||You have much superior vitality.
|-
|3||Adds +12 to your maximum HP.||You have exceptionally superior vitality.
|- 
| colspan="3" |
Functionally the same as the MP aptitude, but for HP. See [[High MP]] for the inverted counterpart.

'''Species notes:''' [[Djinn]] start at level one. This mutation effectively acts as their base MP.
|- style="font-style:italic;" 
| colspan="3" |
[[Good_mutations|Good mutation]]
|}

[[Category:Mutations]]
[[Category:Good Mutations]]
